headline: Henry Schein Leadership Exit Tests Distribution Strength And Competitive Position
summary: Henry Schein's former president of U.S. Distribution has left the company to become Chief Commercial Officer at Owens & Minor. The executive move involves a senior leader with decades of experience overseeing Henry Schein's U.S. distribution operations. The change raises questions for investors about continuity in Henry Schein's core distribution business and competitive positioning in healthcare supply. For investors watching Henry Schein (NasdaqGS:HSIC), this leadership change comes with...
